name: Spawn of Jubjub
tooltip:
Spawn of Jubjub

I'm so happy Jubjub is no longer lost.  She loves Dark Iron ale so much that when I ran out... she ran away to find more!

Now that Jubjub's back, I want as much ale as I can get!  I won't want her to run away again!

Do you have any Dark Iron Ale?  If you do, then I'll trade you one of Jubjub's frog eggs for a mug...

Requirements:
- Dark Iron Ale Mug
